alert.note: Alert for Calvert (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 05 at 7:21AM EDT until June 05 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Calvert County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT this morning, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, water is expected to reach backyards near 9th Street in North Beach, and could approach 9th Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one and a half to two feet above normal. The next high tides at Solomons Island are at 3:46 PM this afternoon and 4:28 AM early Tuesday morning. The next high tides at Chesapeake Beach are at 5:52 PM this afternoon and 6:13 AM Tuesday morning. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chesapeake Bay at North Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 05/05 AM 3.5 2.1 1.6 0.5 Minor 05/05 PM 2.4 1.0 1.5 0.5 None 06/06 AM 3.3 1.9 1.4 0.5 Minor 06/06 PM 2.2 0.8 1.2 0.5 None 07/07 AM 2.8 1.4 1.0 0.5 None 07/07 PM 2.1 0.7 1.0 0.5 None Patuxent River at Solomons Island MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 05/04 PM 2.7 1.2 1.4 1.0 None 06/04 AM 2.9 1.4 1.1 1.0 None 06/04 PM 2.4 0.9 1.1 1.0 None 07/05 AM 2.7 1.2 1.0 1.0 None 07/05 PM 2.3 0.8 1.0 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
